description: Offers will be reviewed as they come.  3 bedroom + 1 bedroom size Den. Cozy Townhouse in Edmonds Located in a quiet community, this charming townhouse is just a 10-minute walk to the SkyTrain station and close to shopping, dining, and parks. It features bright interiors with a cozy fireplace, a private fenced yard. Perfect for families or first-time buyers seeking a peaceful yet central home. Book your viewing today!
